item.title: Hit the ROAD, Tom
item.author: Joseph Hosier,Eleanor Glennon,
item.description: “Are you fucking mental altogether?” “I’ll kill you Brian, I’ll kill you — I’m not joking.” An ambitious and creative production, ROAD presents a bleak look at Thatcherite Britain in a northern town. The play leads us through the lives of the residents on a typical gin-soaked Friday night – from …
